tags.name: zui-shell-apps-item
tags.description:
Child element of `zui-shell-apps` that renders into a link for each product the user has access to.

### Examples
Default
```html
<zui-shell-apps-item unresolved
   slot="apps"
   name="Broker Briefcase"
   description="Growth & marketing platform"
   url="#">
</zui-shell-apps-item>
```

With an optional target
```html
<zui-shell-apps-item unresolved
   slot="apps"
   name="Broker Briefcase"
   description="Growth & marketing platform"
   url="#"
   target="_self">
</zui-shell-apps-item>
```

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: Specify where to open the link. Default opens in a new tab. (Optional)

properties.name: target
properties.description: Specify where to open the link. Default opens in a new tab. (Optional)
